results.name: Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Abilene, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its proximity to great restaurants, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South makes it easy to enjoy the best of Abilene.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Courtyard Abilene features a 24 hour front desk and room service. In addition, as a valued Courtyard By Marriott Abilene Hotel guest, you can enjoy a pool and breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While in Abilene, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Abilene Marriott, including Joe's Pizza (0.2 mi), Nikos Greek Restaurant (0.2 mi), and Casa Herrera (0.3 mi).
Abilene is also known for some great art galleries, including Amy Graves Ryan Fine Arts Gallery and The Center for Contemporary Arts, which are not too far from Courtyard Abilene.
Whether you're traveling for business, pleasure or both, Courtyard Abilene Southwest/Abilene Mall South is sure to make your visit to Abilene one worth remembering.

results.name: Holiday Inn Abilene - North College Area, an IHG Hotel
results.description:
Fresh, modern and convenient, Holiday Inn Abilene North College Area offers a comfortable, familiar atmosphere where guests can relax and enjoy amenities such as free Wi-Fi access, spacious guestrooms with Keurig coffee makers, mini refrigerators, microwaves, and 49" flat screen TV's.  Although our breakfast is not complimentary, it is cooked to order deliciousness. 

We also encourage you to cool down in our outdoor swimming pool and get refueled at Maxx's Bar & Grill, our on-site Full Service Restaurant and Bar. Maxx's serves casual American cuisine: gourmet burgers, steaks and also offers Happy Hour specials every night.  Don't forget, at Holiday Inn kids dine and stay for free! *Restrictions Apply.

Need meeting space? We have two meeting rooms with pre-function space and on-site catering services.  Our experienced sales team would love to assist you in planning your next event!

results.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Abilene
results.description:
Residence Inn Abilene is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Abilene, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Close to some of Abilene's most popular landmarks, such as Paramount Theatre (3.0 mi) and Swenson House Historical Society (3.0 mi), Residence Inn Marriott Abilene Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Residence Inn Abilene is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a kitchenette in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Abilene. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
While you're here, be sure to check out some of the nearby restaurants, including Cracker Barrel (0.6 mi), Betty Rose's Little Brisket (0.4 mi), and Taco Casa #42 (0.7 mi), all of which are within walking distance from Residence Inn Marriott Abilene Hotel.
Abilene is also home to The Grace Museum, a popular art museum that is not too far from Residence Inn Marriott Abilene Hotel.
Enjoy your stay in Abilene!

results.name: Hilton Garden Inn Abilene
results.description:
Welcome to the newest Abilene hotel, the Hilton Garden Inn Abilene, ideally located in the commercial and retail hub of Abilene, Texas. Our Abilene, Texas hotel is convenient to all three major colleges in Abilene: Hardin Simmons, Abilene Christian University, and McMurry University. Additional nearby attractions include: Dyess Air Base, Frontier Texas!, Taylor County Expo Center, Mall of Abilene, Abilene Zoo.  


If you're traveling on business, our Abilene hotel is within close proximity to: Siemens, AT&T, Tower Tech, Fehr Foods, Coca-Cola Bottling Company, Zoltek.  


This hotel in Abilene, Texas features 123 rooms, about 3,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, and an expanded fitness center. Each guestroom at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Abilene, TX is equipped with a 32" LCD TV with high definition programming, spacious work area, complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, and hair dryer.

results.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Abilene, an IHG Hotel
results.description: Whether you are coming to Abilene for business or pleasure let the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites be your home away from home. Conveniently located off I-20 we are the choice of travelers to Abilene Christian University (ACU) and Hardin-Simmons University (HSU). We offer you trouble free high-speed Internet access, comfortable pillow top beds and plush towels in our 300 sq. ft. rooms. If you need a little more space we also have 350 sq. ft. suites to make your stay that much more enjoyable. The Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites Abilene gives you ease of access to all the major attractions in Abilene like Frontier Texas, Taylor County Expo Center, West Texas Fairgrounds, Civic Center, Abilene Zoo, Shotwell Stadium, Paramount Theatre, 12th Armored Division Memorial Museum, Dyess AFB, Bus Station and downtown Abilene. Our location also places you near major companies such as, Region 14 Coca-Cola, the USPS Distribution Center, and the Worlds Largest Wind Farm. When it is time to start your day come and enjoy our deluxe hot Continental breakfast with a varied menu that can offer anything from cheese omelets, bacon, sausage, scrambled eggs to lighter fare such as assorted yogurt and muffins. We know it will be a great start to your day. Come and relax with family we would love to have you and thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Express Hotel and Suites Abilene.

results.name: Abilene KOA Journey
results.description: Welcome! Experience great Texas hospitality at Abilene KOA. Beautiful pecan and mesquite trees cover our campground with accommodations for RV's, Glampers, Campers and Tenters. Friendly staff at the registration office are always available to help. Pull-through and back-in sites include cable, limited WIFI, electric, water, and sewer hook-up. Cozy one and two bedroom rustic cabins have one full and twin bunk bed set; bring your linens or rent from us. Cabins are heated/cooled and equipped with TV, cable, WIFI, and mini-fridge . Tent sites are available for those who enjoy camping outdoors under the big Texas sky. Facilities include a very clean bath house with nice hot showers, general store and 24 hour laundry, meeting/recreation room, playground, basketball, corn hole and horseshoe pits year round. Pool from May to September. Kamp K-9 offers four-legged friends a safe place to play and stretch their legs after a road trip. Remember: There's camping and there's KOA!

results.name: Sparhawk Bed and Breakfast
results.description:
Finding an ideal charming bed and breakfast in Abilene does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Sparhawk Bed and Breakfast, a nice option for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free internet access offered by the bed and breakfast.
Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While staying at Sparhawk Bed and Breakfast, visitors can check out Paramount Theatre (2.1 mi) and Swenson House Historical Society (2.1 mi), some of Abilene's top attractions.
If you're looking for a place to eat, Szechuan Chinese Restaurant (0.2 mi), Krua Thai (0.6 mi), and CK Seafood (0.4 mi) are all within walking distance of Sparhawk Hotel.
Abilene is also home to Lake Kirby Park, a popular park that is not too far from Sparhawk Bed and Breakfast.
Sparhawk Bed and Breakfast puts the best of Abilene at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

results.name: Motel 6 Abilene East
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Abilene, Motel 6 Abilene East is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Motel 6 Abilene East makes it easy to enjoy the best of Abilene.
Motel 6 Abilene East offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The motel offers a 24 hour front desk, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
Close to some of Abilene's most popular landmarks, such as Swenson House Historical Society (2.7 mi) and Paramount Theatre (2.8 mi), Abilene Days Inn is a great destination for tourists.
Travelers looking to enjoy some filet mignon can head to The Beehive or Lytle Land and Cattle Company. Otherwise, you may want to check out a pub such as The Mill Winery, Buffalo Wild Wings, or Chili's.
Best of all, Motel 6 Abilene East makes it easy to experience many great Abilene attractions like Jacob's Dream and Jacob's Dream Sculpture, which are some popular monuments and statues.
Motel 6 Abilene East is sure to make your visit to Abilene one worth remembering.
